## üéâ What's New

### Major Features

**1. Push Notifications**
- Real-time ops alerts
- Release updates
- Customizable notification preferences
- Rich notifications with actions

**2. Deep Links & Universal Links**
- Seamless email verification
- OAuth authentication flow
- Team invitations
- Shared content

**3. Enhanced Performance**
- 40% faster app startup
- Reduced battery consumption
- Improved offline mode
- Smoother animations

**4. Security Enhancements**
- Biometric authentication (Face ID, Touch ID, Fingerprint)
- End-to-end encryption
- Secure credential storage
- Privacy-first analytics

- Fixed crash on app resume from background
- Resolved push notification delivery inconsistencies
- Corrected deep link routing edge cases
- Fixed UI rendering issues on tablets
- Resolved memory leaks causing slowdowns

## üì± Platform Requirements

### iOS
- **Minimum:** iOS 13.0
- **Recommended:** iOS 16.0 or later
- **Devices:** iPhone 6s and newer, iPad (5th gen) and newer
- **Size:** 52 MB

### Android
- **Minimum:** Android 7.0 (API 24)
- **Recommended:** Android 12.0 or later
- **Size:** 45 MB
- **Permissions:** Internet, Notifications (optional)

---

## üîî Notifications

**Manage your notifications:**
- Settings ‚Üí Notifications
- Choose which updates you receive
- Customize quiet hours
- Enable/disable per category

**Notification Types:**
- Ops Alerts (critical issues)
- Release Updates
- Feature Announcements
- Security Advisories

- Email verification
- Password reset

- `https://app.f0.ai/invite`
- `https://app.f0.ai/share`

## üìä What We're Tracking

**Anonymous usage analytics:**
- Feature usage
- Performance metrics
- Crash reports
- Error logs

**We never track:**
- Personal conversations
- Sensitive data
- Location (unless you share)
- Contacts or photos

**Opt-out:** Settings ‚Üí Privacy ‚Üí Analytics

## üöÄ Getting Started

1. **Download the app**
   - iOS: [App Store](https://apps.apple.com/app/f0)
   - Android: [Google Play](https://play.google.com/store/apps/f0)

2. **Create an account**
   - Email + password
   - Or sign in with Google/Apple

3. **Enable notifications** (optional)
   - Get real-time updates
   - Stay informed

4. **Explore features**
   - Check out the new dashboard
   - Try deep link sharing
   - Customize your experience

---

## üîÑ Upgrade Notes

**From Beta:**
- All data preserved
- Settings migrated automatically
- No action required

**First-time users:**
- Create account or sign in
- Grant notification permission (recommended)
- Complete onboarding tutorial

## ‚ö†Ô∏è Known Limitations

- Offline mode: Limited functionality
- Large file uploads: Not yet supported
- Video calls: Coming in next release
- Desktop sync: In development

---

## üõ†Ô∏è Troubleshooting

**Common Issues:**

**App won't open:**
- Restart your device
- Check for system updates
- Reinstall the app

**Notifications not working:**
- Settings ‚Üí Notifications ‚Üí Enable
- Check system notification settings
- Ensure Do Not Disturb is off

**Deep links not opening:**
- Set F0 as default handler
- Clear app cache
- Reinstall if necessary

**More help:** [Support Center](https://support.f0.ai)

---

## üìû Support & Feedback

**Need help?**
- In-app: Settings ‚Üí Help & Feedback
- Email: support@f0.ai
- Docs: https://docs.f0.ai/mobile
- Community: Discord, Reddit

**Found a bug?**
- Report via app feedback
- Email: bugs@f0.ai
- Include: Device, OS version, steps to reproduce

**Feature requests:**
- Vote on existing requests: [Roadmap](https://f0.ai/roadmap)
- Submit new ideas: feedback@f0.ai
